hero.title: Modern websites built by specialists
hero.leadStart: Our websites are coded with performance, accessibility, and
hero.leadEnd: in mind to ensure the best user experience and maximum search engine visibility.
hero.encryptedText: don't wait, improve your business today!

paragraphs: NextSpeed is a team of modern web technology enthusiasts. Since 2020, we've been helping companies abandon outdated solutions and switch to fast, scalable websites powered by Next.js.

We've completed over 150 projects for clients from various industries - from startups to large corporations. Every WordPress migration resulted in dramatic performance improvements and conversion growth.
We specialize not only in technology but primarily in understanding our clients' business. We don't just build websites - we create tools that generate real value and competitive advantage.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Always up to date with the latest web industry trends

values.title: Partnership
values.description: Your success is our success. We achieve goals together

values.title: Quality
values.description: Perfection in every detail. We maintain the highest standards

values.title: Passion
values.description: We love what we do and it shows in our projects

showcase.encryptedText: check how your website works on different devices

desktop.title: Modern design and functionality
desktop.description: We create websites that not only look great but are also intuitive and easy to use for your users.

mobile.title: Optimized for mobile devices
mobile.description: Over 60% of internet traffic comes from mobile devices. Your website will look and work perfectly on every screen.

items.title: Responsive design
items.description: Your customers will easily find what they're looking for, more inquiries and fewer abandonments on mobile.

items.title: Fewer abandonments, more leads
items.description: Short path to offer and contact increases the number of inquiries — by phone and form.

items.title: Speed that sells
items.description: Faster loading means more trust and higher sales, customers stay and return more often.

sectionHeader.title: Why our website?
sectionHeader.description: We know how to turn technology into real benefits for your business.

seo.title: You'll appear on Google
seo.description: You'll appear on the first page of Google before the competition.

costs.title: Lower maintenance costs
costs.description: Forget about annual plugin fees and expensive hosting.

security.title: Secure website
security.description: Don't worry about hacking or data leaks.

mobile.title: Responsive design
mobile.description: Your website looks beautiful on every screen.

scalability.title: Website grows with you
scalability.description: Website easily handles traffic growth and new features.

conversions.title: Higher conversion
conversions.description: Professional website builds trust and attracts more patients.

sectionHeader.title: Our Offer
sectionHeader.description: Choose a package tailored to your business needs. We execute each project individually.

items.name: Starter
items.description: Ideal solution for small businesses and startups

extraPackages.name: E-commerce
extraPackages.description: Online store with complete checkout process and payment integrations.

extraPackages.name: Web Application
extraPackages.description: Dedicated web application tailored to your company's processes.

sectionHeader.title: Technology Solutions
sectionHeader.description: We offer comprehensive solutions tailored to your business needs. From simple websites to advanced platforms with full integration.

cta.text: Don't see the solution you need?
cta.subtext: We'll build a dedicated integration for your requirements.

items.title: Headless CMS
items.label: CMS
items.description: Sanity, Contentful or Strapi - easy content management without coding knowledge. Admin panel customized to your needs.

items.title: E-commerce
items.label: shop
items.description: Online stores with Stripe, Shopify API or WooCommerce. Fast, secure payments and full product control.

items.title: API & Integrations
items.label: API
items.description: Connections with CRM (HubSpot, Salesforce), marketing tools, payment systems and any external services.

items.title: Authentication
items.label: Login
items.description: Secure user login with Auth0, NextAuth or Supabase. Social login (Google, Facebook) and user roles.

items.title: Multi-language
items.label: languages
items.description: Multilingual websites with automatic location detection. SEO optimized for each language separately.

items.title: PWA
items.label: PWA
items.description: Progressive Web Apps - websites working like native mobile apps. Offline mode, push notifications and installation.

items.title: Page Builder
items.label: Edit
items.description: Visual page editors for clients. Create and edit pages without a developer - drag & drop, components, preview.

items.title: Analytics & Tracking
items.label: Analytics
items.description: Google Analytics 4, Facebook Pixel, hotmaps and A/B testing. Full control over conversions and traffic on your site.

items.title: Email Marketing
items.label: Email
items.description: Integrations with Mailchimp, SendGrid, Klaviyo. Automated campaigns, newsletters and transactional notifications.

items.title: Search
items.label: Search
items.description: Advanced search engines with Algolia or ElasticSearch. Lightning-fast results, filters and autocomplete.

sectionHeader.title: Transform your website
sectionHeader.description: See how everything changes after migration from WordPress to Next.js
